title: Rauw Alejandro’s “Cosa Nuestra Tour”: How to Buy Tickets
description: The upcoming tour celebrates the release of the international star's new album Cosa Nuestra. Learn how to get pre-sale tickets here. Rauw Alejandro’s “Cosa Nuestra Tour”: How to Buy Tickets Jonah Krueger
author: Jonah Krueger
excerpt: Rauw Alejandro has announced the "Cosa Nuestra" tour, a run of US arena shows set for 2025. Learn how to get pre-sale tickets here.
text: Rauw Alejandro has charted out a new tour across the United States to celebrate the release of his most recent album, Cosa Nuestra. Fittingly titled the “Cosa Nuestra World Tour” — though, notably, only concerts in the U.S. have been announced thus far — the international star will hit cities like Las Vegas, Chicago, Philadelphia, New York, Miami, and more. The run kicks off on April 5th at Seattle’s Climate Pledge Arena and extends through the end of May. Read on for the full list of dates, as well as ticket information (including pre-sale codes and how to get into sold-out shows). Get Rauw Alejandro Tickets Here What Is Rauw Alejandro’s “Cosa Nuestra” Tour? Rauw Alejandro’s “Cosa Nuestra” tour is a run of 20-plus concerts across the United States. It celebrates and promotes the release of Alejandro’s newest album of the same name, which the artist dropped this past November. Given that Cosa Nuestra debuted at No. 1 on the Latin Albums chart and No. 6 on the Billboard 200, Alejandro’s 2025 outing unsurprisingly sees the Puerto Rican singer and songwriter getting ready to bring his hits to massive arenas around the country. Throughout the jaunt, he’ll hit stops like Inglewood’s Intuit Dome, Chicago’s United Center, Brooklyn’s Barclays Center, and Orlando’s Kia Center, among others. How Can I Buy Tickets to Rauw Alejandro’s 2025 North American Tour? An artist pre-sale for Rauw Alejandro’s “Cosa Nuestra World Tour” launches on Wednesday, December 11th via Ticketmaster. Fans have through December 9th to sign up for access. Do so here. A Live Nation pre-sale will kick off on Thursday, December 12th at 10:00 a.m. local time (use code JOY). The following day, Friday, December 13th, the general on-sale will officially go live, also via Ticketmaster. There will also be pre-sales available for Verizon customers and Cardmembers beginning December 9th. Once tickets are on sale, you can snag passes to Rauw Alejandro shows at StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand. What Are Rauw Alejandro’s Upcoming Tour Dates? See the full list of Rauw Alejandro’s tour dates below, and score tickets here. Rauw Alejandro 2025 North American Dates: 04/05 – Seattle, WA @ Climate Pledge Arena 04/08 – Sacramento, CA @ Golden 1 Center 04/11 – Las Vegas, NV @ T-Mobile Arena 04/12 – San Francisco, CA @ Chase Center 04/13 – Fresno, CA @ Save Mart Center at Fresno State 04/15 – Salt Lake City, UT @ Delta Center 04/17 – Denver, CO @ Ball Arena 04/23 – Phoenix, AZ @ Footprint Center 04/25 – Inglewood, CA @ Intuit Dome 04/26 – Inglewood, CA @ Intuit Dome 04/30 – San Diego, CA @ Viejas Arena 05/01 – Anaheim, CA @ Honda Center 05/03 – Dallas, TX @ American Airlines Center 05/06 – Houston, TX @ Toyota Center 05/09 – Chicago, IL @ United Center 05/10 – Chicago, IL @ United Center 05/14 – Baltimore, MD @ CFG Bank Arena 05/15 – Philadelphia, PA @ Wells Fargo Center 05/17 – Boston, MA @ TD Garden 05/20 – Brooklyn, NY @ Barclays Center 05/21 – Brooklyn, NY @ Barclays Center 05/23 – Raleigh, NC @ Lenovo Arena 05/24 – Atlanta, GA @ State Farm Arena 05/27 – Orlando, FL @ Kia Center 05/30 – Miami, FL @ Kaseya Center 05/31 – Miami, FL @ Kaseya Center
html:
Rauw Alejandro has charted out a new tour across the United States to celebrate the release of his most recent album, Cosa Nuestra. Fittingly titled the “Cosa Nuestra World Tour” — though, notably, only concerts in the U.S. have been announced thus far — the international star will hit cities like Las Vegas, Chicago, Philadelphia, New York, Miami, and more.

The run kicks off on April 5th at Seattle’s Climate Pledge Arena and extends through the end of May. Read on for the full list of dates, as well as ticket information (including pre-sale codes and how to get into sold-out shows).

Get Rauw Alejandro Tickets Here

What Is Rauw Alejandro’s “Cosa Nuestra” Tour?

Rauw Alejandro’s “Cosa Nuestra” tour is a run of 20-plus concerts across the United States. It celebrates and promotes the release of Alejandro’s newest album of the same name, which the artist dropped this past November.

Given that Cosa Nuestra debuted at No. 1 on the Latin Albums chart and No. 6 on the Billboard 200, Alejandro’s 2025 outing unsurprisingly sees the Puerto Rican singer and songwriter getting ready to bring his hits to massive arenas around the country. Throughout the jaunt, he’ll hit stops like Inglewood’s Intuit Dome, Chicago’s United Center, Brooklyn’s Barclays Center, and Orlando’s Kia Center, among others.

How Can I Buy Tickets to Rauw Alejandro’s 2025 North American Tour?

An artist pre-sale for Rauw Alejandro’s “Cosa Nuestra World Tour” launches on Wednesday, December 11th via Ticketmaster. Fans have through December 9th to sign up for access. Do so here.

A Live Nation pre-sale will kick off on Thursday, December 12th at 10:00 a.m. local time (use code JOY). The following day, Friday, December 13th, the general on-sale will officially go live, also via Ticketmaster.

There will also be pre-sales available for Verizon customers and Cardmembers beginning December 9th.

Once tickets are on sale, you can snag passes to Rauw Alejandro shows at StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand.

What Are Rauw Alejandro’s Upcoming Tour Dates?

See the full list of Rauw Alejandro’s tour dates below, and score tickets here.

Rauw Alejandro 2025 North American Dates:
